response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product that has been meticulously designed and crafted with unparalleled quality. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and the craftsmanship involved, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in acquiring this product for $15,000? I trust that you will appreciate its true worth and the value it brings. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
